name: math-wasm
description: High-performance mathematical calculation module written in Go and compiled to WebAssembly. Optimized for GoWM integration.
author: Ben

functions.name: add
functions.description: Add two numbers with error validation
functions.errorPattern: Returns error string if validation fails
functions.example:
const result = math.call('add', 5, 3); // returns 8
const error = math.call('add', 5); // returns "Erreur: deux arguments requis pour add"

functions.name: subtract
functions.description: Subtract two numbers with error validation
functions.errorPattern: Returns error string if validation fails

functions.name: multiply
functions.description: Multiply two numbers with error validation
functions.errorPattern: Returns error string if validation fails

functions.name: divide
functions.description: Divide two numbers with division by zero protection
functions.errorPattern: Returns "Erreur: division par zéro" if divisor is 0
functions.example:
const result = math.call('divide', 15, 3); // returns 5
const error = math.call('divide', 10, 0); // returns "Erreur: division par zéro"

functions.name: power
functions.description: Raise a number to a power (positive exponents only)
functions.errorPattern: Returns error string for negative exponents
functions.example:
const result = math.call('power', 2, 3); // returns 8
const error = math.call('power', 2, -1); // returns "Erreur: exposant négatif non supporté"

functions.name: factorial
functions.description: Calculate the factorial of a non-negative integer

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The number to calculate factorial for (must be non-negative)

functions.errorPattern: Returns error string for negative numbers
functions.example:
const result = math.call('factorial', 5); // returns 120
const error = math.call('factorial', -5); // returns "Erreur: factorielle non définie pour les nombres négatifs"

functions.name: setSilentMode
functions.description: Enable/disable silent mode for console logs

parameters.name: silent
parameters.description: true to enable silent mode, false to disable it

functions.example: math.call('setSilentMode', true); // returns true and enables silent mode

functions.name: getAvailableFunctions
functions.description: Get list of all available functions in the module

errorHandling.description: Math module returns error strings when operations fail

examples.error: Erreur: deux arguments requis pour add
Erreur: factorielle non définie pour les nombres négatifs

types.name: MathResult
types.details: Returns number on success, error string on failure

features: Safe arithmetic operations with overflow protection

examples.title: GoWM Integration - Basic Usage
React Hook Integration
Error Handling Patterns
Vue.js Composable Integration

changes: Initial release with basic arithmetic operations
Added error handling for edge cases
